Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: Great little hidden gem tucked back in the strip mall. Good deals great products.

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: This shop is always clean &  well organized. All of their employees are very knowledgeable of all of their products. Not only is it a great place to shop if you're a smoker, but it's also great gifts shop for any friends/family who smoke. â€¦

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: 5 stars all day long!! I love the glass tobacco pieces they get ;) I quit smoking cigarettes but I will always get my glass from them. The guys that own the place are super awesome too!! <3 thanks for years of amazing service y'all!!!

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: Great Selection. Neal is a great guy. Prices competitive. Location location location. Carry my rare brand of cigarettes. Will stock it if you'll buy it.

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text:
Great prices and selection. Sells Lottery tickets too.
Machines to make cigarettes, tobacco selection great.
Staff very friendly and answers all questions. Cigarettes good price.

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: Great service from everyone there! Bought some items for my hookah and the owner was real nice. Will come back again!

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: I love this store very friendly people with great prices on cigs so happy I found this store won't go anywhere else they got me hooked on the low price and warm feeling when entering the store

Name: Smoke Palace
Review Text: Smoke palace is by far the best place to go in lombard. Everyone is knowledgeable on the products they sell. I have been coming here for years! 10/10
